renderpass.code: void mainImage(out vec4 O, vec2 u) { mi }
renderpass.name: Image

renderpass.code:
//this shader is spooky. All the code is in common
void mainImage(out vec4 O, vec2 u) { mi }
renderpass.name: Buffer A

renderpass.code:
#define T(U)  texelFetch( iChannel0, ivec2(U), 0 )     //
#define K(a)   texelFetch( iChannel3, ivec2(a,1), 0 ).x//
#define mi                                   \
    vec2 S = 18./iResolution.yy,                         \
         U = S*u,        /* current grid position */     \
         F = T(0).xy;    /* frog position         */     \
    O-=O;                                                \
    T(F/S).a != 0. ?     /* no collision          */     \
                                                         \
    /* draw obstacles */                                 \
        U.y<1. || U.y>17. || abs(U.x-16.-12.*sin(iTime+86.*ceil(U.y))) > 5. ? O++: O, \
    /* frog moves     */                                 \
        u==u-u+.5 ? O.xy = F + vec2( K(39)-K(37), K(38)-K(40) ) \
    /* draw frog      */                                 \
                  : floor(U)==F ? O.rb-- : S             \
    :                                                    \
    /* frog crashed   */                                 \
        u==u-u+.5 ? O.z = T(0).z+1.,                     \
                    O.z > 60. ? O-=O, O.x=16., S : S     \
                  : ( O = sin(9.*iTime+vec4(0,2,4,0)), S );
renderpass.name: Common
